item.description:
Hi folks,
Keith here passing along a heads up to an event that would be of interest to job changers and career strategists using Real Time Web - the internet -to market yourself.

Among her many endeavors, Leah is the Social Media Specialist at Jewish Vocational Service, a nonprofit that helps people network and find jobs. She has organized this networking event with personal branding expert Dan Schawbel on May 17th that we wanted to make you all aware of.

Here are the event details:

Careers, Beers and The Brand Called You: A Conversation With Dan Schawbel

When: Thursday, May 17, 2012 from 6:30 PM - 8:00 PM
Where: The Boston Synagogue, 55 Martha Road, Boston 02114
Cost: $10 (includes entrance, beer and food)
Open bar with beer courtesy of Sapporo

PLEASE Register online at:
https://careermoves.wufoo.com/forms/careers-beers-and-the-brand-called-you/

or you can contact Leah directly with any questions.

lberk@jvs-boston.org
617-399-3186

Thanks!

Keith
item.name: Careers, Beers and a Brand called YOU
